objects.text:
• Powerful Motor Performance
• 3 Versatile Stainless Steel Jars
• Multiple Speed Settings
• Durable & Easy to Clean

product_details.name: Sujata Dynamix Power Mixer Grinder - 3 Jars | Premium Kitchen Powerhouse
product_details.description:
• Powerful motor for efficient grinding and mixing performance
• Comes with 3 versatile stainless steel jars for different grinding needs
• Transparent dome-shaped lids with measuring cup functionality
• Ergonomic jar handles for comfortable grip and pouring
• Speed control dial with multiple settings (Low, Med, High)
• Durable stainless steel blades for consistent grinding
• Sturdy white ABS body construction for long-lasting use
• Safety-lock mechanism for secure operation
• Ideal for wet & dry grinding, chutney making, and blending
• Compact design perfect for modern kitchens
• Easy to clean and maintain
• Perfect for Indian cooking needs
• Anti-skid feet for stable operation
• Overload protection for motor safety

banner_details:
The banner is a vibrant and modern promotional layout segmented into four equal quadrants with clean division lines. The upper left quadrant features bold branding text including `heading_1`, `heading_2`, followed by a concise `subheading` and a strong `tagline`. This section includes geometric overlays and circular design elements for contemporary appeal. The upper right quadrant showcases the `product_image` of a mixer grinder with subtle vertical line accents.

The lower left quadrant highlights product features listed under the `description` text, while the lower right quadrant combines the `price`, `cta_button` with `cta`, and secondary message `tagline_2`. Decorative dotted lines and a background circle add style to the call-to-action area.

**Color Palette:**
- Purple: #6B3FA0
- Light Purple: #8A49CC
- Light Gray: #F5F5F5
- Gray: #E0E0E0
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek and modern mixer grinder with a predominantly white and metallic silver aesthetic. The base unit is a clean matte white (#F5F5F5), conveying a sense of purity and hygiene, essential for kitchen appliances. Stainless steel jars dominate the visual with reflective silver (#C0C0C0), giving a premium and sturdy look. Transparent lids and handles in a clear, frosted gray (#DCDCDC) blend technology with functionality. A pop of purple (#8E44AD) on the speed dial adds visual contrast and catches the viewer's eye. Colors are well-balanced, with metallics highlighted through shadow play and soft gradients, enhancing elegance and functionality.
